Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP38.client

Class BoardDecoder

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP38.client.BoardDecoder
public class BoardDecoder
extends java.lang.Object
This class includes methods used to decode the status of the cells of the board. For details regarding the encoding of the board's status, refer to the documentation of BoardEncoder class
Author:
Maximilien Groh (10683107)

  • Constructor Details

    • BoardDecoder

      public BoardDecoder()

  • Method Details

    • isFree

      public static boolean isFree​(byte b)
      Method used to check if it's possible to move a worker or build something onto a given cell of the board
      Parameters:
      b - represents the encoded cell that will be checked
      Returns:
      true if the cell is not occupied by a worker and no dome has been built on it, false otherwise

    • hasDome

      public static boolean hasDome​(byte b)
      Method used to check if the given cell has a dome built on it
      Parameters:
      b - represents the encoded cell that will be checked
      Returns:
      true if the cell has a dome on it, false otherwise

    • hasWorker

      public static boolean hasWorker​(byte b)
      Method used to check if the given cell is occupied by a worker
      Parameters:
      b - represents the encoded cell that will be checked
      Returns:
      true if a worker of any color is stationing on it, false otherwise

    • workerColor

      public static WorkerColor workerColor​(byte b) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Method used to determine the color of a worker
      Parameters:
      b - represents a generic encoded worker
      Returns:
      the color of the encoded worker
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the code doesn't correspond to one of the defined colors

    • towerHeight

      public static int towerHeight​(byte b)
      Method used to determine the height of a given tower
      Parameters:
      b - represents a generic encoded tower
      Returns:
      the height of the tower represented by b
